name: Spellcasting Contract, Greater
book: Pathfinder 29: Mother of Flies. Copyright 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like lesser spellcasting contract, except if the target has 13 HD or more you can imbue him with one or two 4th- level spells and one 5th-level spell.
text_zh: 这个法术的作用类似于“次级法术契约”，如果目标拥有13HD以上生命骰，你可以向他灌输一到两个4环和一个5环法术。
